code: import{Cookies}from"react-cookie";const cookies=new Cookies();export const setCookie=(name,value,days)=>{const expires=new Date();expires.setUTCDate(expires.getUTCDate()+days);return cookies.set(name,value,{path:"/",expires:expires});};export const getCookie=name=>{return cookies.get(name);};export const removeCookie=function(name){let path=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"/";cookies.remove(name,{path});};
